text: We Live Again is a 1934 American drama movie directed by Rouben Mamoulian and starring Anna Sten, Fredric March, Jane Baxter, C. Aubrey Smith, Sam Jaffe. Maxwell Anderson wrote the screenplay, which is an adaptation of a 1899 novel Resurrection (Voskraeseniye) by Leo Tolstoy. It was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * * Category:1934 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Rouben Mamoulian
title: We Live Again
